_exampleHooks._instructions: Uncomment and customize these hooks after registering your project and agent. If your server requires auth, generate a local config with an embedded token via ./scripts/integrate_claude_code.sh (recommended) instead of committing secrets.

hooks.command: uv run python -m mcp_agent_mail.cli file_reservations active YOUR_PROJECT_NAME
uv run python -m mcp_agent_mail.cli acks pending YOUR_AGENT_NAME --limit 20
uv run python -m mcp_agent_mail.cli file_reservations soon YOUR_PROJECT_NAME --minutes 10
uv run python -m mcp_agent_mail.cli list-acks --agent YOUR_AGENT_NAME --limit 10
uv run python -m mcp_agent_mail.cli file_reservations list YOUR_PROJECT_NAME
